channel.title: Server advertisement board
channel.description:
After a [i]lot[/i] of discussion and debate, the time has come for the return of the Private Server Advertisement board! With this change comes a small adjustment to the rules as well, so take a look at them too! The staff here at MoparScape realize that this will be a group effort to get started, so we'd like to give you a brief introduction as to what you can expect.
[i][b]Please[/b] read this thread in its entirety if you plan on advertising in this new board.[/i]
[size=15pt][u][b][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,221.0.html]RS2 Server Advertisements[/url][/b][/u][/size]
This new advertisement board is here to work in conjunction with the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php]Server Status Page[/url], as well as the many different development sections here at MoparScape. It is allowed, and highly encouraged, to have an entry in both the section and the status page.
[u][b]Advertisement Links[/b][/u]
You do [u]not[/u] need to get your private server website approved to post it in the advertisement section (or status page), but as always, you [u]do[/u] need to get it approved to post it anywhere else on the forum. You can post a link to your server status page advertisement in your advertisement thread, but nowhere else. If you create a [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,125.0.html]server development[/url] thread, you can post a link to your advertisement thread in it, but [u]not[/u] your website link directly.
[u][b]Other Ideals:[/b][/u]
[ol][li]We will not interfere with your donation systems, but selling staff positions is not conductive and if your server advertises that anywhere it will be removed and banned from our website. Please do not advertise your donation systems in your thread either, but feel free to do so on your website.
[/li]
[li]Please be courteous in your use of images and videos in your thread. Avoid the use of overly-large images or too many videos as this may affect our users with low bandwidth or website censorship.
[/li]
[li]Any malicious content in your advertisement or other posts will get your server banned from this website permanently.
[/li]
[li]Do not abuse this advertising privilege. Do not advertise your server in others threads, and do not flame others servers anywhere on the forum. If you have a complaint or report, please private message a staff member.
[/li]
[li]Using the different avenues of the forums to advertise your server is allowed and encouraged (the server status page and advertisement board), but creating more than one advertisement in either of these venues is prohibited, and may result in a removal of [i][u]all[/u][/i] of your advertisements.
[/li][/ol]
These guidelines may change at any time. For an up-to-date list of the current section rules, please see [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547853.0.html]this topic[/url]. If you have a question or comment, feel free to private message a [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338737.0.html]staff member[/url] or reply to the linked post.
As a final note, this section may not be permanent if it is deemed to be more trouble than it is worth, or it gets abused too much.
Please post responsibly. :)
- [i]The MoparScape Staff Team[/i]

item.title: Server advertisement board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:16, topic:445169”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=547856.msg4019001#msg4019001 date=1339875497]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=547856.msg4018988#msg4018988 date=1339874721]
Can we sell items/services in our private server?
[/quote]We will not interfere with any of your donation methods/services, as long as they are:
a) Not related to the selling of staff positions
and
b) You do not list your donation/selling things in your advertisement here
[/quote]You might want to clear it up even more in the OP.[/quote]

Feel free to clarify it if you think it needs to be. My goal was to simply outline the brief concepts.

Read full topic

item.title: Server advertisement board
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

^ You may be want to be more specific.

Selling items in the game such as vesta = 20$ etc etc of course… how else will people be insinuated to donate … inb4vaultdiscussion

services? ~^ I am assuming somebody on your forums could start a “service” thread for like "training mining, doing jad - best prices around " if you allowed it?

The main thing is they do not allow staff spots being sold. In reality though I find it hard to believe that they can stop that. You see it every day on brand new servers to be honest.

Read full topic
